question: Which Ministry has unveiled the first look of Delhi-Ghaziabad-Meerut Regional Rapid Transit System (RRTS)?
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA) released the first look design of Delhi-Ghaziabad-Meerut Regional Rapid Transit System (RRTS). The RRTS trains would have an outer body made of steel which is light in weight, thus enabling it to travel at a design speed of 180 kmph.
These trains would be fully air conditioned. NCRTC - a joint venture company of Govt of India and States of Delhi, Haryana, Rajasthan and Uttar Pradesh, would implement the Regional Rapid Transit System (RRTS).
